Name: The King's Bird
About the game: Flight · Flow · Freedom Escape into a world kept secret by a tyrant, and discover the truth about your freedom. The King’s Bird is an artistic, momentum-based game that seamlessly combines precision-platforming with physics-based gliding. A new yet easily accessible take on the precision-platforming genre. Dynamic background music and sounds that change based on your movements Text-less narrative told through visuals in motion Five unique worlds to explore, full of vibrance and colorful silhouettes, with inspirations from ancient Mayan, Southeast Asian, and Roman cultures
